TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void MountChangedHandler(object o, MountChangedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed MountChangedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the MountChangedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the MountChangedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the MountChangedHandler is removed from the event.
